article_html:
Tippy enjoys travelling the world. He likes the colour orange, making his own shoelaces, the music of the Japanese new wave band Polysics, and chocolate eclairs. He can often be found socialising with his crew: Pedro the squirrel, Grayson the horse and Mr Neville (the newsagent). Tippy is to feature in his own photo comic strip in Moose Kid Comics out this summer.

text:
Tippy enjoys travelling the world. He likes the colour orange, making his own shoelaces, the music of the Japanese new wave band Polysics, and chocolate eclairs. He can often be found socialising with his crew: Pedro the squirrel, Grayson the horse and Mr Neville (the newsagent). Tippy is to feature in his own photo comic strip in Moose Kid Comics out this summer.

title: The puppets of the Felt Mistress - in pictures
